message: I squeeze my eyes shut, but the light is still blinding.

name: 紅雀
message: "...When I came to, it was already over."
The light resolves into a series of images, progressing before me like a silent film.
I see a big estate and a young Koujaku, his mother leading him by the hand. The man waiting at the gate has the air of an old-school mob boss.
And standing next to him... is a younger Ryuuhou.
The scene changes. Now it shows that candle-lit room, the futon where Koujaku lay as Ryuuhou put needle to skin.
His eyes are screwed tight, hands clawing at the mats. The pain must have been unbearable.
Koujaku is standing, sword in hand, amid a sea of blood.
Bodies lie at his feet. His skin, too, is marked with red wounds.

name: 紅雀
message: "That was the day he finished it."
Koujaku's voice comes from everywhere at once.

name: 紅雀
message: "The pain kept getting worse. I passed out. And when I opened my eyes... I was standing in a pool of blood."

name: 紅雀
message: "Everyone was on the ground... I didn't know what had happened."

name: 紅雀
message: "And that was when... I saw my mom lying there too. I looked down at my hands. I was holding a sword, covered with blood."

name: 紅雀
message: "I'd lost my mind, gone on some kinda rampage. Of course, I was just a kid flailing around."

name: 紅雀
message: "No one was dead, though they were hurt pretty bad. My mom was still hanging on by a thread, too... but she..."

name: 紅雀
message: "She never woke up. She died in the hospital... and it was my fault. I killed her."
